document_data.name: Angel of Protection
document_data.mainbody: '''Angels of protection''' were a variety of [[angel (astral)|angels]] devoted to the role of guardian or caretaker for important individuals or places.
document_data.Abilities: These angels radiated an angelic aura of protection around them that made it more difficult to harm them or their designated ward, as well as more difficult to move around the area.
document_data.Combat: An angel of protection was typically outfitted in [[plate mail]] and a [[greatsword]].
document_data.History: In the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]], a few [[adventurer]]s in the [[Sword Coast]] were seen to be accompanied by an angel of protection.<ref>

Society.Relationships: These angels were sometimes found fighting in the company of [[angel of battle|angels of battle]] and [[angel of valor|angels of valor]]. Those guarding a site were likely to be found fighting alongside an [[eidolon]].
